types.html:
sous couvert de

  1. under the shelter of, under cover of
    sous couvert d'anonymat ― under cover of anonymity
  2. under condition of
  3. under the pretext of, under the pretense of
  4. under the direction of, on the orders of
trans: under the shelter of, under cover of
under the pretext of, under the pretense of
under the direction of, on the orders of

under the pretext of, under the pretense of
under the direction of, on the orders of

title: sous couvert de
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /su ku.vɛʁ də/
